message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of automatically describing the content of an image using natural language processing and computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also uses a deep recurrent architecture, which is a common technique in natural language processing, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper uses machine learning techniques to train the model, which could place it in cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Lastly, the paper deals with generating natural language descriptions, which could also place it in cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
